name: AK-47
description: The AK-47 is a reliable and widely-used assault rifle, known for its durability and effectiveness.

name: M4 Carbine
description: A popular assault rifle used by various armed forces, known for its accuracy and flexibility.

name: Desert Eagle
description: A powerful pistol with a high stopping power, often favored by special forces.

name: Sniper Rifle
description: Designed for long-range precision shooting, the sniper rifle is a high-damage, high-range weapon.

name: MP5
description: A compact and lightweight submachine gun, commonly used in close combat situations.

name: Grenade Launcher
description: Ideal for dealing massive damage to groups of enemies or fortified positions.

name: Glock 17
description: A versatile and widely used pistol with a strong reputation for reliability and ease of use.

name: M16 Rifle
description: A standard issue assault rifle known for its accuracy and effectiveness at medium to long ranges.

name: UMP45
description: A powerful submachine gun designed for close-quarter combat, commonly used by special forces.

name: SPAS-12
description: A combat shotgun known for its devastating power at close range.

name: M249 SAW
description: A light machine gun that provides sustained fire, ideal for suppressing enemy positions.

name: Barrett M82
description: A high-caliber sniper rifle capable of disabling armored vehicles and long-range targets.

name: RPG-7
description: A portable anti-tank rocket-propelled grenade launcher, used for heavy assault on vehicles and structures.

name: FN SCAR
description: A modular assault rifle with options for various configurations, known for accuracy and durability.

name: FN P90
description: A compact weapon designed for close-quarters, popular with tactical teams for its maneuverability.

name: Beretta M9
description: A standard-issue pistol in various military forces, known for its reliability and accuracy.

name: M60 Machine Gun
description: A heavy machine gun providing high firepower, typically mounted on vehicles or used for suppression.

name: Steyr AUG
description: A bullpup assault rifle with a unique design, favored for its compact form and accuracy.

name: Remington 870
description: A reliable and popular pump-action shotgun, widely used by law enforcement and military.

name: PKM
description: A Soviet-designed general-purpose machine gun, highly reliable and used worldwide.

name: Kriss Vector
description: Known for its unique design to reduce recoil, making it easy to control during rapid fire.
